summary: Oh no! It appears as if Satan isn't going to fill his soul quota this month! So of course, he turns himself into a tour guide and takes a bus-load of unsuspecting tourists on a ride down the highway to hell.
cast: Scot Robinson|Joe Bill|Ken Manthey|Dave Adler|Michael Coleman|Susan Messing|Ellen Stoneking|Beth Cahill|Mike Monterastelli|Dan Wachtel|Tom Keevers|Ed Furman|Jodi Lennon|Mark Sutton|Gary Ruderman|Steve Cowdrey|Linda Perry|Nancy Giangrasse|Al Rose|Tony Dicosola|Blue|Cliff Fox|Lyn Pusztai|Dan Heberkorn|Esta-Joy Peters|Phil Granchi|Mary Collins|Jennifer Estlin|Pat Walsh|Ray Quinn|Dr. Scot|Peter A. Hulne|Matt Walsh|Eric Hoffman|Rebecca Sohn|Mary Wachtel|Mary Helfrich|Elsa LaJack Keevers|Bob Ahlgren|Bob Morand|Gary Jenkins|Josh Walker|Kyle Dolan|Yvonne Bruner|David Summers|Geoffrey Lantz
title: Fatty Drives the Bus
